meanings.def: done as part of a plan that is meant to achieve a particular purpose or to gain an advantage
examples: a strategic decision to sell off part of the business
Cameras were set up at strategic points (= in places where they would be most effective) along the route.

meanings.def: connected with getting an advantage in a war or other military situation
examples: Malta was of vital strategic importance during the war.
the strategic bombing of communication centres

meanings.def: intended to be fired at an enemy’s country rather than used in a battle
